entry.title: New release for Hoodik: Release v1.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Release v1.1.1 by @htunlogic in https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/pull/82

Full Changelog: https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2
